# uptimekuma_notification_heiioncall (Resource)

Heii On-Call notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_heiioncall" "example" {
  name       = "Heii On-Call Alerts"
  api_key    = "your-heii-oncall-api-key"
  trigger_id = "your-heii-oncall-trigger-id"
  is_active  = true
  is_default = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Heii On-Call API key for authentication
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `trigger_id` (String) Heii On-Call trigger ID

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
